foundryvtt-smarteasy-target.settings.rel: This setting determines how refresh target behaves when clicking multiple tokens. 'Sticky' mode will target each clicked token without un-targeting anything, and you must click a token again to un-target it. 'Standard' mode more closely matches the standard foundry behaviour where all previous tokens are automatically un-targeted when clicking a new token, and you must hold Shift while clicking in order to target multiple tokens.
